com.damedesuyo.irc.god_bot

Class UserDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.damedesuyo.irc.god_bot.UserDatabase

  • public class UserDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides functionality to retrieve and edit information about users present on the database

        public int addStaffToDatabase(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> userData)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        userData - Data about the user. Must include userName.
        Returns:
        error code: 0 : success -1 : Missing Critical info -2 : User Already existed -3 : SQL exception occurred -4 : SQL insert into the tables failed. -5 : userName was not a string
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
